sentences.en: A rifle and a harpoon gun were hanging from the wall of his rickety shack.
sentences.cn: 在纳希破烂不堪的小屋里，墙上挂着一支步枪和一支鱼叉枪。

sentences.en: Come up easy and let me put the harpoon into you.
sentences.cn: 轻松愉快地浮上来吧,让我把鱼叉刺进你的身子.

sentences.en: Finally, he kills it with a harpoon and ends its pain.
sentences.cn: 最后, 老人用鱼叉将鱼杀死,结束了它的痛苦.

sentences.en: He hit it with his blood mushed hands driving a good harpoon with all his strength.
sentences.cn: 他使出全身的力气,用糊着鲜血的双手,把一支好鱼叉向它扎去.

sentences.en: He prepared the harpoon and made the rope fast while he watched the shark come on.
sentences.cn: 他准备好了鱼叉,系紧了绳子,一面注视着鲨鱼向前游来.

sentences.en: He's going to harpoon the shark and blow it up?
sentences.cn: 他要用鱼叉射鲨鱼然后炸死它 吗 ?

sentences.en: Mareccu pointed with the tip of his harpoon before moving.
sentences.cn: Mareccu在移动之前以他的鱼叉顶端指.

sentences.en: Norwegian whalers said yesterday they had harpooned a female minke whale.
sentences.cn: 挪威的捕鲸人昨天说他们用捕鲸叉捕获了一头雌性小须鲸。

sentences.en: Now the bad time is coming and I do not have the harpoon.
sentences.cn: 现在倒霉的时候就要来到,我连鱼叉也给丢了.

sentences.en: Sam Burich held his harpoon gun ready.
sentences.cn: 萨姆·伯里奇扶着他的捕鲸炮准备发射.

sentences.en: The fisherman transfixed the shark with a harpoon.
The harpoon drove deep into the body of the whale.
sentences.cn: 渔叉深深地扎进鲸鱼体内.

sentences.en: The harpoon tore along his arm all the way down to his hand.
sentences.cn: 那鱼叉沿着他的胳臂一直划到他的手.

sentences.en: The whale dived as the harpoon struck it.
sentences.cn: 鲸鱼被鱼叉射中后潜入水中.

sentences.en: They tried to get the harpoon into the ray before the sting tail came lashing over to retaliate.
sentences.cn: 他们试图把鱼叉刺进鳐鱼体内，以防它猛摆那蜇人的尾巴报复。

sentences.en: When a boat got close enough to the whale, the harpooner threw his harpoon at it.
sentences.cn: 等船非常接近鲸鱼时, 鱼叉手就以鱼叉向它投射.

sentences.en: With failing might the old man struck the shark with his harpoon.
sentences.cn: 老人用尽余力把鱼叉往鲨鱼身上扎去.

trans.tran_en: a weapon used for hunting whales
To harpoon a whale or large fish means to hit it with a harpoon
